description.zh: Dialoqbase 是一个开源应用，允许用户基于自定义知识库创建专属聊天机器人。它利用先进的语言模型和 PostgreSQL 的向量搜索能力，提供准确且上下文相关的回复。该工具支持多种数据源和 AI 模型提供商，便于灵活、个性化的聊天机器人开发。
description.en: Dialoqbase is an open-source application that enables users to create custom chatbots powered by their own knowledge base. It leverages advanced language models and PostgreSQL for vector search to deliver context-aware, accurate responses. The tool supports various data sources and AI model providers for flexible, personalized chatbot development.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 让非专家用户也能轻松搭建AI驱动的聊天机器人，配置简单
- 支持自托管和定制化部署，保障数据隐私与自主控制
- 兼容多种大语言模型和嵌入模型提供商，灵活性极高

## 功能列表:

- 基于个性化知识库创建自定义聊天机器人
- 利用强大的语言模型生成上下文感知的回复
- 使用 PostgreSQL 实现高效的向量搜索和知识库存储
- 支持多种数据加载器，包括 PDF、YouTube、GitHub、MP3 和网站等
- 集成主流 AI 提供商：OpenAI、Anthropic、Google、Fireworks、Ollama 等
- 提供可嵌入网页的小工具，并支持 Telegram、Discord 和 WhatsApp 集成
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Empowers non-experts to build AI-powered chatbots with minimal setup
- Enables full control over data privacy with self-hosted, customizable deployment
- Supports integration with multiple LLM and embedding providers for maximum flexibility

## Features:

- Create custom chatbots using a personalized knowledge base
- Utilize powerful language models to generate context-aware responses
- Use PostgreSQL for efficient vector search and knowledge base storage
- Support for diverse data loaders including PDF, YouTube, GitHub, MP3, and websites
- Integration with major AI providers: OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Fireworks, Ollama, and more
- Embeddable web widget and support for Telegram, Discord, and WhatsApp integrations
